entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET Core 2.0 has reached end of life #86

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should not `IAsyncEnumerable` inherit from (implement) `IEnumerable`? #58476
  • dotnet paket restore crashes on macos : Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005 #58473
  • Intermittent hang/deadlock in .net core 5.0.400 while debugging #58471
  • Documentation unclear on whether the x64 installer of the .NET runtime also installs the 32-bit runtime #58470
  • .NET SDK RC* Produces Exception in Syncfusion Control #58469
  • Thread suspension comments should be updated or code removed #58466
  • Use `.dotnet` instead of `.net` for single file applications in .NET 7 #58464
    7.0.0
  • OSArchitecture is wrong on non-Windows #58463
  • StringBuilder.Insert() overload to insert a character any number of times #58461
  • [API Proposal]: Make StringBuilder.AppendSpanFormattable<T> #58459
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Guid support to StringBuilder #58458
  • Runtime fails to source build - libSystem.IO.Ports.Native.so.dbg not found #58455
    6.0.0
  • Test timeout: BeginSendToV6IPEndPointToV6Host_Success #58453
    Future
  • Test timeout: BeginReceiveFromV6BoundToSpecificV6_Success #58452
    7.0.0
  • At high concurresion, WebSocket.State has different values in different threads #58451
  • [HTTP/3] Optimize reading from Quic stream #58445
    7.0.0
  • [Libraries][iOS/MacCatalyst/tvOS] IsIanaIdTest misidentifies America/Buenos_Aires as not an IanaId #58440
    7.0.0
  • [.NET 5] Issue with SocketsHttpHandler & TLS 1.3 #58439
  • Consider returning a generic `Dictionary` from `Environment.GetEnvironmentVariables`. #58438
  • High CPU usage due to Lstat sys calls on configuration reload thread #58429
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add RemoveAt to IList by Index struct overload #58426
  • Issue with X509Certificate2 and private key handling in dotnet/runtime #58424
  • HttpClient headers extension #58425
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator 5.0.0 does not work with WCF Core 3.2.1 #58421
  • [6.0] No build warning from RequiredPreviewFeatures attribute? #58419
    6.0.0
  • [libraries][MacCatalyst] System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher NonZeroTimeout_NoActivity_TimesOut failure #58418
    7.0.0
  • [libraries][Android] System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates No IndexOutOfRangeException thrown #58416
    6.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.CounterCreationDataCollectionTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_CreateCategory #58413

Closed

  • QUIC: Add API to allow detecting when peer aborts receive #58229
    6.0.0
  • Perf regression in string handling / culture ICU #58029
    6.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo.HasIanaId returning false for an IANA timezone on Linux #58326
    6.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http undoc APIs #58131
  • More safe per-user location for temp files for single-file-apps? #35221
    Future
  • H/2 stress many failure in content posting methods #55261
    7.0.0
  • TaskTimeoutExtensions.WhenAllOrAnyFailed eats OperationCanceledExceptions from awaited tasks #58081
    7.0.0
  • Make DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler Text and Clear APIs public #55390
    Future
  • Compiler gives weird error messages #58450
  • Loader/classloader/regressions/523654/test532654_b/test532654_b.sh failing in CI #57812
    6.0.0
  • [wasm] `mono-aot-cross` asserts with `function:mono_method_to_ir, VAR 1 (TValue_REF) cannot be expanded in this context with 1 instantiations ` #57560
    6.0.0
  • Epic: Expand .NET WebAssembly Capabilities #43767
    6.0.0
  • Move from .Net Core 3.1 to .Net 6 missing components? #57680
  • User Story: WebAssembly developers want smaller published output to speed up their apps load time #44317
    7.0.0
  • User Story: Developers need more flexibility for globalization settings to fulfil their needs on the web #44321
    6.0.0
  • Developers can AOT compile .NET apps into WebAssembly format #44316
    6.0.0
  • AssemblyDependencyResolver not using nuget package storage #57345
    7.0.0
  • HTTP2: Inbound flow control - default settings vs. adaptive algorithm #1587
    6.0.0
  • corefx-net-http endpoints - 100s timeout #45269
    7.0.0
  • [.NET 6] PriorityQueue not FIFO at same priority #58432
  • Socket.Select on linux gives wrong result when fails to connect #55538
    Future
  • [JitStressWithRandomNumbers] inliningVars.cmd fails #57914
    6.0.0
  • [6.0.100-rc.1.21425.10] ControlzEx Failed to build with Nullability of reference types error when retarget to .NET 6.0 #58422
  • [API Proposal]: Provide MemoryMarshal.Cast(Memory) method or alternative to asynchrously fill an array #58363
    Future
  • GZipStream.ReadAsync blocks with a zero-length buffer #52009
    5.0.x
  • `WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated` method throws PlatformNotSupportedException #58407
  • Add EventCounter for ArrayPoolEventSource #40830
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add RemoteInvokeOptions to EtwManifestGeneration test #58478
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test enhancement, 6.0.0
  • Delete redundant AssemblyName test #58477
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove dead code #58475
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • fix stable pkg proj versioning support #58474
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58472
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [debugger] Avoid calling debugger_agent_single_step_from_context when thread is not attached yet #58467
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #58465
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • More cleanups in Assembly/Loader/Binder area #58462
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fix content stream read hang #58460
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Don't always build source build with ci flag #58457
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add System.Net.Http ServerCertificateCustomValidationCallback ILLink Suppression #58456
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • JIT: Fix preheader weight computation #58454
  • Check normalize-on-load in LowerRetSingleRegStructLclVar #58449
    * NO MERGE *, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support duplicated type names with src gen #58448
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Address feedback of #57424 #58447
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Multi-target LoggerMessageGenerator between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Run minimal set of iOS / tvOS device tests #58444
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix X509ChainElementCollection_CopyTo_NonZeroLowerBound_ThrowsIndexOutOfRangeException test on Android #58441
    area-System.Security
  • lateapexearlyspeed-issue-58383 Support unseekable filestream when Rea… #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix crossgen2 calli GC hole by unifying MethodDesc/MethodSignature IsMarshallingRequired logic #58430
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Reenable a few OperatingSystem tests on MacCatalyst #58428
  • [release/6.0] Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #58423
    area-System.IO
  • Add linker flags to add fixup data to PDBs #58417
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [QUIC] Add QuicStream.WaitForWriteCompletionAsync #58415
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [.NET 5.0] Notify Reference Tracker runtime of disconnect at the right time #58412
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 5.0.x
  • Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #58410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [QUIC] Add QuicStream.WaitForWriteCompletionAsync #58236
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Enforce scatter/gather file I/O Windows API requirements et. al. #57424
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, Future
  • Share compiler configurations across libs & coreclr #58096
    community-contribution
  • Remove dead code in coreclr #58420
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress disable offending op causing server errors #58442
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add documentation to Microsoft.Extensions.Http #57719
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Eliminate DACCESS_COMPILE from gc.cpp and gcpriv.h #57607
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix ep_rt_atomic_compare_exchange_size_t in Mono EventPipe shim. #58369
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [release/6.0] Don't blank out SpecialFolders on Android if they don't already exist #58361
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeZoneInfo.HasIanaId when using Local Time Zone #58414
    area-System.Globalization
  • [HTTP/3] Fix content stream read hang #58296
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix WhenAllOrAnyFailed to not eat OperationCanceledExceptions #58338
    test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • add RIDs for Tizen 6.5 #56805
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Removed '-r2r' shorthand flag due to conflicts with '-r' #56934
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Set values for Nuget.Client EXPERIMENTAL_HTTP_RETRY #58386
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Require workloads if using `@(NativeFileReference)` #58290
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix fgValueNumberArrIndexVal for wide reads #58427
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • A few more regex test #58154
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix EventSource tests #56452
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [release/6.0] Enable win registry install location for all architectures #57851
    area-Host
  • Integration of changes in shared files from runtimelab/NativeAOT #58411
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Use OutputRid in test projects #58340
    area-Infrastructure
  • Delete redundant interop tests #58400
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [Libraries][Android] Fix alignment for padding System.Decimal #58380
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-android
  • Define s390x ABI values when cross-compiling #58431
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Cleaned up version of earlier PR #48601. #56772
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Socket: check connect result when non-blocking connect completes. #57756
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize TimeSpan.FromX for constant input #55745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix fgValueNumberArrIndexVal for wide reads #58309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add s390x support in a few places in eng/native build scripts #58366
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Don't generate safepoints inside write barrier wrapper #58346
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • roll r2r jobs into crossgen2-outerloop #58282
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix TimeZoneInfo.HasIanaId when using Local Time Zone #58392
    area-System.Globalization
  • Fix detection of unsupported links #58391
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Initial document for JIT and GC stress usage #58147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, Future
  • [release/6.0] Bring back System.Security.AccessControl package #57816
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, regression-from-last-release
  • [release/6.0] add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58336
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Add internal AppExecLink support to link APIs #58233
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Remove conditional compilation conditions that are no longer possible #58377
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Delete `TruncateOrSignExtend32` #56904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Stop using ERR_GET_FUNC, since it has been removed in OSSL3 Beta2. #57879
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Remove usage of [AggressiveOptimization] #58253
    area-System.Text.Json
  • In reset_memory, check settings.entry_memory_load ... #58350
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix x86 linux tests #57244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58129
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Set generic type arguments nullability for value types #58390
    area-System.Reflection
  • Stop retyping RHSes to byrefs on type mismatch #58297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Import `KEEPALIVE(BOX)` as `KEEPALIVE(ADDR(TEMP))` #54412
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Leverage `cwde` and `cdqe` for sign extensions on xarch #56172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [release/6.0] [mini] Dynamically allocate a buffer for large runtime invoke results #58364
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [libraries] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst #57208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst
  • Optimize division by constant after AND or RSZ #55778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Console.Write on iOS #56713
    area-System.Console, os-ios, 6.0.0
  • Run runtime tests marked as JitOptimizationSensitive on Mono. #58106
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [WASM] Converting runtime JS to TS #55871
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Mono][Test] Make Interpreter Lane Run Interpreter #54201
    test bug, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [WASM] Fix v8 trimming tests on windows #53698
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable fast path serialization for types with properties using custom converters. #58291
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Optimization for left-shift operator #52297

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Generic virtual method pointer lookup failure #1473
  • Regression after 6.0.0-rc.1.21373.1 (all versions) #1372
  • [NativeAOT] BinSkim - EnableCriticalCompilerWarnings #1439
  • Seg fault on empty ARM application #1463
  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: Crossgen2ToolExecutable <- Should this be running for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime ? #1475

Updated

  • Support x86 for NativeAOT #1471
  • I cannot config rd.xml for refleaction exception. Please help me #1428

PullRequests

Created

  • fixed deep recursion crash in SRM #1478

Merged

  • Include canonical forms of types involved in GVM dispatch #1477
    area-NativeAOT
  • Bug fix of dfa lazy dot star #1472
  • Build Debug ObjWriter in Checked/Debug configurations #1476
    area-NativeAOT
  • Update LLVM 5.0 -> 12.0 #1461
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Merge runtime-main into feature/s390x #1474

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Global tool installation should not use local NuGet.config #20396
  • Failed to validation package signing for 3rd-party workload packs #20381
  • dotnet pack fails to create .snupkg symbols package when <PackageReadmeFile> is set #20371
  • Hot Reload does not work when running dotnet blazorwasm app in container #20368

Closed

  • 7.0.1xx SDK branding and manifest #20268
  • Improve command-line help for `dotnet workload install` `--download-to-cache` #20283
  • Hide `--sdk-version` parameter to workload commands #20357
  • `dotnet publish` Targets Different Frameworks when Publishing Multiple Projects #16450
    Discussion
  • Improve command-line help for `dotnet workload uninstall` #20284
  • SDK should not list test nupkgs in ItemsToSignPostBuild #20060

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow the app to rebuild when a new scoped css file is added #20417
    Area-NetSDK
  • Merge release/6.0.1xx rc1 #20415
    Area-Workloads
  • Adding issue templates for repo [skip ci] #20413
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet-watch ux changes #20412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Doc for build deb and rpm locally #20405
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20391
  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20390
  • Fix missing packaged shim after update #20389

Merged

  • Allow the app to rebuild when a new scoped css file is added #20400
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Should lambda expression or method group be considered convertible to `MulticastDelegate` if the delegate type cannot be inferred? #5124

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revisit DelegateRelaxationReceiver and InterpolatedStringHandler SynthesizedLocalKinds #56044
  • Tons of assertion failures when building runtime with debug compiler #56043
  • Improve error message for ref struct capture as a delegate receiver #56042
  • Add test for LSP frozen semantics #56038
  • Allow Exception to bubble out of IAsyncStateMachine.MoveNext when not called from a continuation #56036
  • Cannot convert lambda expression to `LambdaExpression` #56033
  • I can't use source generator with package reference #56024

Closed

  • [LSP] Initial semantic tokens should be computed against frozen compilation #55637
    17.0
  • Add code-style option for file-scoped namespaces #54745
    17.0
  • Attempting to edit code in a rename preview causes inescapable modal #54876
    17.0
  • Intellisense of params expression method parameter is not as expected #37005
    Backlog
  • Internal Compiler Error: NullReferenceException / NullableWalker.LocalState.SetValue for switch over bool in lambda #55227
    17.0
  • Build and Removed Unused References are both bound to the same key #56028
  • Breakpoint should be placed over the inheritance margin #55056
    17.0
  • Inheritance margin interferes with breakpoints #55353
    17.0
  • Make MetadataReferences a top level SG input #55130
    17.0
  • Switch case after `or` pattern does not match #55668
    17.0.P4
  • Avoid calculating the inferred delegate type multiple times #52869
    17.0
  • Build fails with CS0263 when a partial class derived from a generic type is defined across different nullable contexts #45960
    17.0.P4

PullRequests

Created

  • Update version for preview 5 #56048
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't reference VS Shell binaries in EditorFeatures.Wpf #56045
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56040
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56039
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56037
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Instrumenting flaky TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #56029
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve the tooltip of Inheritance Margin #56026
    Area-IDE
  • Improve the signature display when a tuple appears many times within it. #56025
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main-vs-deps into release/dev17.0-vs-deps #56047
  • Merge main into release/dev17.0 #56046

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56050
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #56049
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Preserve conversions on null literals before nullable type argument reinference #56022
    Area-Compilers
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Track duplicate hintNames as they are added #55905
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Options refactoring #55686
    Area-IDE
  • Move compiler test ref assemblies to NuPkg #55963
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge Move Static Members feature to 17.1 #55964
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • Don't add async modifier for void return method #55983
    Area-IDE
  • esnure path to global config file is correctly cased #56021
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Source generators high level syntax api #55984
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Add ISymbol.MetadataToken #55913
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Creating a ASP.NET Core Web App project with "dotnet" at the end of its name results in error 500.0 when debugging with IIS Express. #35998
  • Add an option to the Web API project template to allow the included content to use Minimal APIs instead of controllers #35996
  • How to use Html.DisplayFor correctly ? #35991
  • Exception when running tests for an app that uses Minimal APIs #35990
    6.0-rc2
  • Analyzers - Nullable incorrectly flags null even if checked for non-null #35989
  • CSharpExplicitExpression not being parsed inside TagHelpers #35988
  • Strange coloring in Blazor component parameter #35984
    17.0-Preview5
  • Quarantining `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.FunctionalTests.LinkedApplicationTests.LinkedApplicationWorks` #35977
  • Implement HTTP/3 100 Continue #35974
  • .NET 6, Preview 7: Setting title in WASM App #35973
    6.0-rc2
  • Still producing the Readme.md about identity server when creating a Blazor webassembly app with AAD or AAD B2C auth #35971
    6.0-rc2
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.1.21424.13] SCF Failed to launch after retargetting to .NET 6.0 #35985
  • Java SignalR: App is crashed if AccessTokenProvider Single emits an Error #35968
  • blazor-hotreload.js is missing if `UseFrameworkFiles` is set to a subdirectory #35967
  • [Blazor-Server] Ability to change renderer's Culture on each component #35965
  • Handle not found (404) when using DynamicRouteValueTransformer #35964
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext #35963
  • Startup regression: connectionclose, https #35961
  • In-app IHostingStartup instances are not discovered/run when --applicationName is passed via args to WebApplication.CreateBuilder, e.g. from test projects #35956
  • UseDeveloperExceptionPage plain-text response should set charset #35954

Closed

  • Auto-complete places message in the wrong place #35392
  • SignlalR HubConnectionBuilder cookie&proxy with HttpMessageHandlerFactory #35958
  • ProjectSnapshotManagerDispatcher has the same thread used for Language Server & VS Client #35852
    17.0-Preview4
  • `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Razor.ProjectSystem.DefaultProjectSnapshotManager` Causing Large Amount of `System.Reactive` Components in Memory #35797
    17.0-Preview4
  • Failed Test `ServerBindTest.CanBindTextboxNullableDateOnlyWithFormat` #34984
    6.0.0
  • Razor offering "use expression body members" light bulb for implicit expressions #35002
  • Consider switching Razor semantic tokens cache to cache tokens per-doc #31989
    17.0-Preview4
  • Embedded TypeScript in Razor does not work in .NET 6 apps, .net 5 is fine #34893
    17.0-Preview4
  • Provisional C# completions no longer work #34820
  • Switching build configurations throws numerous exceptions from DefaultProjectWorkspaceStateGenerator #34771
    17.0-Preview4
  • Create CTI issue for hot reload that is nightly #34295
    17.0-Preview4
  • Using a custom serviceprovider does not work with "minimal" web app #35992
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 7, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 7 #aspnetcore-104050-.NET7 #35774
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 6 RC 1 #aspnetcore-104199-.NET6RC1 #35775

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .UseSqlite : Does not apply HasQueryFilter correctly on "include" childrens properties #25800
    6.0.0
  • Sqlite: Deleting a database previously referenced by a different connection string throws #25797

Closed

  • Cosmos: Translate Skip and Take #15734
    3.1.0
  • SqlException: A connection was successfully established with the server, but then an error occurred during the login process. (provider: SSL Provider, error: 0 - The target principal name is incorrect.) #25803
  • Many-to-many AsSplitQuery create redundant sql #25767
  • Detect simple join tables in reverse engineering and create many-to-many relationships #22475
    6.0.0-rc1
  • System.NullReferenceException thrown for many-to-many without navigation properties on one or both sides of the relationship #25383
  • Improve exception message for projection with JSON field conversion #21602
    6.0.0
  • Query: compilation error for query projecting collection followed by FirstOrDefault accessing another collection #22896
    6.0.0
  • NotMapped composed property causes all properties load in select statement in EF Core #25742
  • Using Cosmos provider OrderBy owned property throw exception togheter with OData #24510

PullRequests

Created

  • Use new Hosted build pools #25807
  • Configure self-referencing navigations when disambiguated by ForeignKey attributes #25806
  • Change Cosmos FromSqlRaw to be over DbSet #25805
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #25801
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Query: Add regression test for #21602 #25792
  • Query: Re-enable test for #22896 #25795

Updated

  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
